title: Ben Webster - 2000 - Ben Webster's Finest Hour FLAC
description:
Ben Webster - 2000 - Ben Webster's Finest Hour

Ben Webster's tone on tenor saxophone became one of the most recognizable in jazz; he possessed a tough sound on upbeat tunes while playing soft and light on ballads. As part of Verve's Finest Hour series, Ben Webster is heard on a combination of standards and originals along with some of the biggest names in jazz: Ella Fitzgerald, Coleman Hawkins, Billie Holiday, and Gerry Mulligan. These 16 tracks include "Star Dust," "While We're Dancing," "Chelsea Bridge," and "Do Nothin' Til You Hear From Me." This compilation doesn't present a complete overview of Ben Webster's career, but it is an excellent budget introduction.

Track list:
01 - See You at the Fair
02 - Hotter than 'Ell
03 - The Ghost of Dinah
04 - Cotton Tail
05 - Honey Hill
06 - Linger Awhile
07 - Star Dust
08 - Do Nothin' Till You Hear from Me
09 - My Greatest Mistake
10 - La Rosita
11 - Sunday
12 - While We're Dancing
13 - Blues for Mr. Broadway
14 - Chelsea Bridge
15 - Roses of Picardy
16 - Single Petal of a Rose

Personnel:
Ray Brown - bass
Barney Kessel - guitar
Phil Woods - alto saxophone
Herb Ellis - guitar
Harry "Sweets" Edison
Jimmy Rowles
Harry Lookofsky - tenor violin
Grady Tate
Hank Jones
Richard Davis
Also: Oscar Peterson, Ella Fitzgerald, Gerry Mulligan, Johnny Hodges, Billie Holiday, Roy Eldridge, Oliver Nelson, Benny Carter

Enjoy and share!
